item.title: 在众议院议长迈克-约翰逊（Mike Johnson）否决了参议院通过的国家安全补充提案后，一个由两党议员组成的众议院小组于上周末公布了一项新的对外援助和边境提案。
item.description: After Speaker Mike Johnson rejected the Senate-passed national security supplemental, a bipartisan group of House lawmakers unveiled a new foreign aid and border proposal late last week. trib.al/86dECWw

item.title:
R转@ABC"它从路边跳下来，紧紧抓住她......她的朋友们得以脱身，把这东西打跑了"
这次遭遇发生在华盛顿州法尔城附近，60 岁的骑手因伤势严重住院。
item.description:
“It jumped from the side of the road and latched onto her ... her friends were able to detach and fight this thing off."

The encounter happened near Fall City, Washington, and left the 60-year-old rider hospitalized with serious injuries.

item.title:
多年来，梵蒂冈一直试图揭穿其秘密档案是如此秘密的说法。
但某种神话和神秘的光环一直存在--直到现在。
item.description:
The Vatican has been trying for years to debunk the idea that its secret archives are all that secret.

But a certain aura of myth and mystery has persisted — until now. trib.al/3LA8aWv

item.title:
据当局称，在西雅图郊区的一条小路上，一群骑自行车的人击退了袭击一名同伴的美洲狮，挽救了她的生命。
更多信息请点击此处：
item.description:
A group of cyclists saved a fellow rider's life by fighting off a cougar that attacked her on a suburban Seattle trail, according to authorities.

More here: abcnews.go.com/US/cyclists-f…

item.title: 在以色列与哈马斯的持续战争中，加沙第二大医院的病人正在撤离，该医院一直受到以色列国防军部队的攻击。
item.description: Patients are being evacuated from Gaza's second-largest hospital, which has been under attack from Israel Defense Forces troops, amid the ongoing Israel-Hamas war. trib.al/qUEVKri

item.title:
美国前总统特朗普周六在费城进行了一次不同寻常的竞选活动，他在 "Sneaker Con"（运动鞋大会）上推广新品牌运动鞋。
阅读更多
item.description:
Former Pres. Trump made an unusual campaign stop in Philadelphia Saturday, promoting new branded sneakers at “Sneaker Con,” a gathering that bills itself as the “The Greatest Sneaker Show on Earth.”

Read more: abcnews.go.com/Politics/trum…

item.title: 拜登总统为自己的政绩和胜任公职的能力进行了有力的辩护--但如果他退出竞选或因健康危机而无法参选，民主党人将如何挑选提名人：
item.description: Pres. Biden has forcefully defended his record and fitness for office — but if he were to, hypothetically, withdraw from the race or find himself unable to run due to a health-related crisis, here's how Democrats would pick a nominee: trib.al/Qe5kGvC

item.title:
在纽约一名法官对他漫长的欺诈案审判处以 3.55 亿美元罚款（他计划对此提出上诉）后的第二天，前总统特朗普在宾夕法尼亚州和密歇根州这两个战场上度过了他的周六。
第一站：费城的 Sneaker Con。
item.description:
The day after a New York judge fined him $355 million in the wake of a lengthy fraud trial, which he plans to appeal, former Pres. Trump spent his Saturday in two battleground states, Pennsylvania and Michigan.

First stop: Sneaker Con in Philadelphia. trib.al/yPUBffr

item.title: R to @ABC：据联邦官员称，这次是因为他自 6 月 27 日以来在芝加哥郊区参与了至少七起银行抢劫案。
item.description: This time, it's for his involvement in at least seven bank robberies in the Chicago suburbs since June 27, according to federal officials.

item.title: 据联邦官员称，一名 83 岁的老人因 20 世纪 80 年代的一连串银行抢劫案而被监禁了三十多年，如今他又身陷囹圄。
item.description: An 83-year-old man imprisoned for more than three decades for a string of 1980s bank robberies is back behind bars, according to federal officials. trib.al/fKlLEw3

item.title: 据当局称，周末假日期间，一群骑自行车的人在西雅图郊区的一条小路上击退了袭击一名同伴的美洲狮，从而挽救了她的生命。
item.description: A group of cyclists saved a fellow rider's life by fighting off a cougar that attacked her over the holiday weekend on a suburban Seattle trail, according to authorities. trib.al/xvX95Ks

item.title:
2023年2月18日，吉米-卡特在佐治亚州的家中接受临终关怀。
从那时起，生命末期关怀专家们就说他的经历 "让安宁疗护焕发了新的光彩"。
item.description:
On Feb. 18, 2023, Jimmy Carter entered hospice care at his home in Georgia.

Since then, experts on end-of-life care say his experience has "shed hospice in a new light." trib.al/CRCYMkJ

item.title: 已故俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的妻子尤利娅-纳瓦尔娜娅周一在社交媒体上发布了一段视频，指责弗拉基米尔-普京与她丈夫的死有关，并发誓要继续他一生的事业。
item.description: In a video posted to social media Monday, Yulia Navalnaya, wife of late Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny, accused Vladimir Putin of being involved in her husband's death and vowed to continue his life's work. trib.al/1spxmIE

item.title: 新泽西州的一位女士肩负着一项使命，那就是为那些可能不了解或不知道有这么多历史悠久的黑人大学为今天的学生服务的学生们带来黑人大学的体验。
item.description: A New Jersey woman is on a mission to bring the HBCU experience to students who might not know about or realize the many historically Black colleges and universities serving students today. trib.al/QCfW7Zx

item.title: 在全国各地的手术室里，越来越多的糖尿病患者因 2 型糖尿病并发症而接受截肢手术。
item.description: In operating rooms across the country, more and more diabetics are receiving amputations due to complications from type-2 diabetes. trib.al/fBd5Hj4

item.title: 一场巨大的漏水事故给德克萨斯州学院站的居民造成了混乱，周末的道路被迫关闭。
item.description: A huge water leak caused chaos for residents in College Station, Texas, forcing a road closure over the weekend. abcn.ws/2Mp6pHp

item.title: 最新消息：据警方称，一名嫌疑人因涉嫌科罗拉多大学科罗拉多斯普林斯分校校园内的两起凶杀案于周一被拘留。
item.description: BREAKING: A suspect was taken into custody Monday in connection with a double homicide at the University of Colorado, Colorado Springs campus, according to police. trib.al/63oTm8s

item.title: 最新消息：据警方称，科罗拉多大学科罗拉多斯普林斯分校发生一起双重谋杀案，一名嫌疑人已被拘留。
item.description: JUST IN: A suspect was taken into custody in connection with a double homicide at the University of Colorado - Colorado Springs, according to police. trib.al/hCxMUex

item.title: 科学家们在土星一颗最具传奇色彩的卫星下发现了一个新近形成的 "力量"，它酷似《星球大战》中帝国的死星。
item.description: Scientists have discovered a recently formed "force" under one of Saturn's most storied moons that resembles the Empire's Death Star from 'Star Wars.' trib.al/8lywShg

item.title: 在科罗拉多州西南部的一条公路上，人们看到巨大的冰柱悬挂在过往车辆的上方，周围一片冰天雪地。
item.description: Huge icicles were seen hanging above passing vehicles on a road in Southwest Colorado amidst a landscape of snow and ice. abcn.ws/2Mp6pHp

item.title:
新消息：周一凌晨12:40左右，印第安纳波利斯一家华夫饼屋发生大规模枪击事件，造成一人死亡，五人受伤。
最新消息
item.description:
NEW: One person was killed and five others were injured in a mass shooting at a Waffle House in Indianapolis at around 12:40 a.m. Monday.

The latest: abcnews.go.com/US/shooting-i…

item.title: 前总统特朗普首次就俄罗斯反对派领袖阿列克谢-纳瓦尔尼的死发表直接评论，抱怨他声称自己在法律诉讼中面临的政治迫害。
item.description: Former Pres. Trump used his first direct comment on Russian opposition leader Alexei Navalny's death to complain about the alleged political persecution he claims he's facing in his own legal battles. trib.al/98twBUs

item.title: 一项拟议的集体诉讼称，Tinder、Hinge 和其他 Match 约会应用程序充满了令人上瘾的功能，鼓励 "强迫性 "使用。
item.description: Tinder, Hinge and other Match dating apps are filled with addictive features that encourage “compulsive” use, a proposed class-action lawsuit claims. trib.al/LqvWXf9

item.title: 陷入交友软件的怪圈而无法约会？针对 Match Group 的一项新诉讼称，这是设计所致。
item.description: Stuck in a dating app loop with no date in sight? A new lawsuit against Match Group claims that it's by design. trib.al/qxzTpJt

item.title: 塔斯马尼亚铁路运营商分享的录像显示，一辆卡车在火车头驶近时横穿铁轨，险些与迎面驶来的火车发生严重碰撞。
item.description: A truck narrowly avoided a serious crash with an oncoming train after it sped across the tracks as a locomotive approached, footage shared by Tasmania’s rail operator shows. abcn.ws/2Mp6pHp

item.title: R to @ABC：周一的抗议活动标志着工人们在两个月内第二次关闭这座每天约有 20,000 名游客的地标性建筑。
item.description: Monday's protest marks the second time in two months that workers have shut down the landmark that draws an estimated 20,000 visitors per day.

item.title: 关闭！周一，埃菲尔铁塔的工人举行罢工，他们认为管理不善可能会危及这座拥有 135 年历史的古迹，因此游客们被拒之门外，无法游览巴黎最著名的地标性建筑。
item.description:
CLOSED! Tourists looking to explore Paris' most famous landmark were turned away from the Eiffel Tower on Monday as workers went on strike over what they contend is mismanagement that could jeopardize the 135-year-old monument.

abcnews.visitlink.me/SvK92A

item.title: 温迪公司与 肉桂蛋糕店合作，为其早餐菜单设计了一种甜美的新糕点，这种糕点具有标志性甜点的所有风味、质地和怀旧感。
item.description: Wendy's worked with Cinnabon to create a sweet new pastry for its breakfast menu that delivers all the flavor, texture and nostalgia of the iconic confection. trib.al/v6DKwG5

item.title: 天文学家发现了可能是宇宙中最亮的天体--一颗类星体，它的中心有一个黑洞，黑洞的生长速度非常快，每天吞下的黑洞相当于一个太阳。
item.description: Astronomers have discovered what may be the brightest object in the universe — a quasar with a black hole at its heart growing so fast that it swallows the equivalent of a sun a day. trib.al/OAVCAX1

item.title:
R转@ABC：据预测，风暴系统将在周二继续影响加利福尼亚州，然后在周三移出该地区。
请关注最新预报：
item.description:
The storm system is forecast to continue impacting California through Tuesday before it moves out of the region on Wednesday.

Follow along for the latest forecast: abcnews.go.com/US/california…
